Rana Hassan

Rana is an enthusiastic Computer Engineer with a passion in learning and development. She enjoys a good cup of coffee and exploring new technologies. Threefold's innovattion bring great technology and new ideas to the world. Being a part of that is definetly a lifechanging experience.
